trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Downingtown
There were no other sightings in Downingtown on or around October 8th 2010
Summary: White shiny orb, traveling extremely fast towards philly
divs: Sighting DetailsLooking up at the chimney at the bees and stink bugs i noticed straight up in the sky a white shiny orb traveling fast towards Philadelphia, I first thought it was a balloon, but i realized its traveling way too fast. As fast or faster than a satellite. this was not a plane. I lost sight of the object when it just disappeared in mid air 4 inches above the tree line. it happened an hour ago, as im typing two all black military helicopters came flying in the same flight path but in the opposite direction. prob a coincidence but interesting.
